Hero.title: - We care about your child's future
Hero.desc: Our experienced teachers will make the learning process as engaging and effective as possible for your child.

About.title: About Us
About.desc: For comfortable education and quality time, we group children into small, cozy classes divided by age and learning focus. We offer an individual approach to each child. No more than 10 students per class. In-depth English language learning. Additionally, we send our students abroad for language practice. Classes are from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Optional: three balanced meals a day and help with homework.   All the conditions and comfort your child needs!

main.school: For a comfortable time at our school, we prepare tasty and healthy meals three times a day.
main.informational: The 21st century is the era of information technology. Your child will be able to learn the basics of programming, trends in the world of gadgets, and professions of the future.
main.calculations: We will teach children to quickly perform complex mathematical calculations mentally.
main.available: For free communication in English, we provide a full day of Speaking sessions.
main.teachers: Our highly qualified teachers will teach children English, Russian, Arabic, and Chinese languages.

class.logopedics: Calligraphy study, speech therapy, English etiquette, conversational English, general education subjects, and sports activities.
class.cognition: English 1 step, Chinese language, arithmetic, logical thinking, general education subjects, and sports activities.
class.language: English 2 step, Arabic language, psychology, mental arithmetic, IT technologies, general education subjects, and sports activities.
class.education: English 3 step, French and German languages, IT technologies, general education subjects, and sports activities.
class.logical: Mathematics, logical thinking, handwriting, art studio, IT technologies, robotics, gymnastics, taekwondo.

contact.address: Tashkent city, Chilanzar district, 16th quarter, Botirma street
contact.celebrate: To celebrate the opening of our school, we’re offering a 20% discount
